duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide deskside support and technical assistance to end-users in an onsite environment.
Utilize problem-solving and organizational skills to troubleshoot and resolve technical issues.
Assist with network troubleshooting and provide support for LAN/WAN issues.
Perform root cause analysis and determine appropriate courses of action based on results.
Maintain proficiency with Microsoft Office Suite, Windows Operating Systems, VPN client software, Remote Desktop tools, and Web-based applications.
Collaborate with the IT team to ensure the smooth operation of computer systems and resolve technical issues.

education_certification.credential: BA or Vocational school degree preferred or equivalent work experience
